A cada 8 horas.description: Step 1: Limpeza do depósito sob trave
Step 2: Limpeza da bomba de vácuo
Step 3: Limpeza electromandril e verificação funcionamento
Step 5: Limpeza da cremalheira do eixo x

A cada 15 horas: Step 1: Lubricate the automatic recirculation pads.
Step 2: Inspect all moving parts for wear.
Final Step: Ensure smooth movement and confirm completion.
A cada 24 horas: Step 1: Lubricate the automatic recirculation pads.
Step 2: Inspect all moving parts for wear.
Final Step: Ensure smooth movement and confirm completion.
